basic_info.description:
I'm Ekaterina Khoroshilova, and I'm excited to share a bit about myself. Originally from Moscow, Russia, I've been calling the United States home for the past 6 years.

My journey has been a diverse one, taking me through various roles and experiences. From exploring photography and working in pharmacy tech to immersing myself in marine biology and serving in the Coast Guard as a yeoman, I've embraced each opportunity with enthusiasm.

The ever-evolving world of web development has captured my interest, and I'm committed to staying at the forefront of this dynamic field. With a deep love for gaming and a fascination with the rapid advancements in AI, I'm driven to make a meaningful impact in both realms.

Currently, I'm pursuing a software development course at Code Fellows, where I'm blending academic knowledge with hands-on experience. I'm on the lookout for exciting projects that allow me to channel my creativity and drive positive change.

Let's connect and explore how we can collaborate to shape a brighter future! ðŸš€

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
